segments.text: You'll soon graduate from your university . Do you have any plans for the future ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm planning to go to graduate school , but I also want to find a job . Otherwise , I'll have nowhere to go if I fail the entrance exam .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have a clear career path to follow ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: what kind of job do you want after graduation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to become a professor , a lawyer , an editor , a civil servant ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: wait ! You can't do so many things at the same time . What exactly do you want ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know . Do you have any advice for me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: yeah , you should first decide what kind of career you really want , plan your career path , and then try your best to achieve your goal .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think perhaps I need to buy a few years while I figure out about my career .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: no , you can't waste your time wandering around . If you want a job that requires a higher degree or diploma , you should focus on your graduate school entrance exam ; if you want a job that needs working
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: thank you so much for your advice . I'll think it over .
segments.speaker: S2
